body_html: Sure, just putting it out there, because it's not a well known fact, but this is one of the reasons why I've been trying to avoid the static registration code in PyTorch so far. Although I have to agree that it's very convenient.

body: Sure, just putting it out there, because it's not a well known fact, but this is one of the reasons why I've been trying to avoid the static registration code in PyTorch so far. Although I have to agree that it's very convenient.
